item.title: Barrows (sendFrame bug)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Ok,

so i got a place where you go to kill barrows && pick the chest for items. These all work fine…no problem

the only problem is…
When you go to barrows it send a frame or whatever to tell you barrows and the wilderness bones.
This is what i want but when i teleport out of barrows i still get the barrows sign…

Any help?

---- MY BARROWS CODING ----

public boolean isInBarrows() {
    if (isInArea(3522, 9720, 3583, 9675)) return true;
    if (isInArea(3546, 3305, 3583, 3264)) return true;
    return false;
  }

And…

public int WildyLevel = 0;
public int leftwild = 0;
public boolean InWildrange = false;
public boolean inSafezone = false;
public void WriteWildyLevel()
{
if (isInBarrows()) {
outStream.createFrame(208); //
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@whi@Barrows", 199);

} else { 

}     
}

Somebody please help, and thanks alot
